targets.query: SELECT last("uptime") AS "value" FROM "system" WHERE "host" =~ /$server$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT mean("free") AS "value" FROM "disk" WHERE "host" =~ /$server$/ AND "path" = '/' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT mean("available_percent") AS "value" FROM "mem" WHERE "host" =~ /$server$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT mean(load1) as load1,mean(load5) as load5,mean(load15) as load15 FROM "system" WHERE host =~ /$server$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), * ORDER BY asc

SELECT mean(total) as total, mean(used) as used, mean(cached) as cached, mean(free) as free, mean(buffered) as buffered  FROM "mem" WHERE host =~ /$server$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), host ORDER BY asc

SELECT mean(usage_idle) as "idle", mean(usage_user) as "user", mean(usage_system) as "system", mean(usage_softirq) as "softirq", mean(usage_steal) as "steal", mean(usage_nice) as "nice", mean(usage_irq) as "irq", mean(usage_iowait) as "iowait", mean(usage_guest) as "guest", mean(usage_guest_nice) as "guest_nice"  FROM "cpu" WHERE "host" =~ /$server$/ and  cpu = 'cpu-total' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), *
SELECT mean(total) AS "total", mean(used) as "used" FROM "disk" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "host", "path"
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(reads),1s) as "read" FROM "diskio" WHERE  $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), *
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(writes),1s) as "write" FROM "diskio" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), *
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(read_bytes),1s) as "read" FROM "diskio" WHERE  $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), *
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(write_bytes),1s) as "write" FROM "diskio" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), *
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(read_time),1s) as "read" FROM "diskio" WHERE  $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), *
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(write_time),1s) as "write" FROM "diskio" WHERE  $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), *
SELECT mean(free) as "free", mean(used) as "used", mean(total) as "total" FROM "swap" WHERE  $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), host ORDER BY asc
SELECT mean("in") as "in", mean("out") as "out" FROM "swap" WHERE host =~ /$server$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), host ORDER BY asc
SELECT "DaemonThreadCount" FROM java_threading WHERE $timeFilter group by host
SELECT "PeakThreadCount"  FROM java_threading WHERE $timeFilter group by host
SELECT "TotalStartedThreadCount"  FROM java_threading WHERE $timeFilter group by host
SELECT "ThreadCount"  FROM java_threading WHERE $timeFilter group by host
SELECT LoadedClassCount FROM java_class_loading WHERE $timeFilter group by host
SELECT TotalLoadedClassCount FROM java_class_loading WHERE $timeFilter group by host
SELECT HeapMemoryUsage.used FROM java_memory WHERE $timeFilter group by host
SELECT NonHeapMemoryUsage.used FROM java_memory WHERE $timeFilter group by host
SELECT PeakUsage.used FROM java_memory_pool where $timeFilter group by host
SELECT Usage.used FROM java_memory_pool where $timeFilter group by host

list.label: Server
list.name: server
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM system WITH KEY=host
